Description: Fragment of a wooden coffin; paint on plaster; one row and four columns of Hieroglyphic text. Part of the same coffin as EA47586 and EA47588 according to Zitman (131, 216).
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Bibliographic references: Zitman 2010 / The necropolis of Assiut: a case study of local Egyptian funerary culture from the Old Kingdom to the end of the Middle Kingdom (II, 131, 126)
